<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:WindowedApplication xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml" layout="absolute" backgroundColor="#323232" 
    width="100%" height="100%">
    <mx:Script>
        <![CDATA[
            import mx.collections.ArrayCollection;
            import mx.collections.IViewCursor;
            import mx.controls.Alert;
            
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.*;
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.events.SmugMugResultEvent;
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.methodgroups.Albums;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var service:SmugMugService;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var fileRef:FileReference = new FileReference();
            
            [Bindable]
            private var albumsColl:ArrayCollection;

            private var curs:IViewCursor;
            private var currentAlbumId:String;
            private var currentAlbumKey:String;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var currentAlbumName:String;
            private var photoId:String;
            private var photoKey:String;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var nickname:String;
            
            private function onLogin():void {
                service = new SmugMugService("PUT-YOUR-KEY-HERE",false);
                service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.LOGIN_WITHPASSWORD, onLoginResult);
                service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.ALBUMS_GET, onAlbumsGet);
                service.login.withPassword(userid.text,pw.text);
                fileRef.addEventListener(Event.SELECT,onFileSelect);
            }
            private function onFileSelect(event:Event):void
            {
                this.fileName.text = fileRef.name;
            }
            private function onLoginResult(event:SmugMugResultEvent):void {
                if (event.success) {
                    nickname = event.data.login.Login.User.NickName;
                    this.userLoggedIn.text=nickname+" successfully logged in";
                    service.albums.get();
                }
                else {
                    this.userLoggedIn.text = "Not logged in";
                    Alert.show("Userid not a valid SmugMug account, please enter full SmugMug email address.");
                }
            }
            private function onAlbumsGet(event:SmugMugResultEvent):void {
                if (event.success) {
                    albumsColl = new ArrayCollection(event.data.Albums);
                    curs = albumsColl.createCursor();
                    var currentAlbum:Object = curs.current;
                    currentAlbumId = currentAlbum.id;
                    currentAlbumKey = currentAlbum.Key;
                    currentAlbumName = currentAlbum.title;
                    service.images.get(currentAlbum.id,currentAlbum.Key,false);
                }
                else Alert.show("Error occurred retrieving albums " + event.data);
            }
            private function onUpload(event:Event):void {
                service.images.upload(fileRef,albumList.selectedItem.id,"tourDeFlexSample" + new Date().time.toString());
                Alert.show("Image uploaded successfully to album " + albumList.selectedItem.Title+".");
            }
        ]]>
    </mx:Script>
    <mx:HBox width="100%" height="100%">
        
        <mx:Form defaultButton="{btn}" color="#FFFFFF" width="100%">
            <mx:FormHeading label="SmugMug Login"/>
            <mx:FormItem label="Userid:">
                <mx:TextInput id="userid" width="150" color="#000000"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem label="Password:">
                <mx:TextInput id="pw" width="150" displayAsPassword="true" color="#000000"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem>
                <mx:Button id="btn" label="Login" click="onLogin()"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem>
                <mx:Text id="userLoggedIn" text="Not logged in"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
        </mx:Form>
        
        <mx:HBox width="100%" height="100%" color="#FFFFFF" top="50">
            <mx:Form defaultButton="{btnUpload}" color="#FFFFFF" width="100%">
                <mx:FormItem width="100%">
                    <mx:VBox width="100%">
                        <mx:Text text="Select Album:"/>
                        <mx:List id="albumList" dataProvider="{albumsColl}" color="#000000" labelField="Title" 
                             width="100%" height="100%" top="50"/>
                    </mx:VBox>
                </mx:FormItem>
                <mx:FormItem>
                    <mx:HBox>
                        <mx:TextInput id="fileName" width="150" color="#000000"/><mx:Button label="Select File" click="fileRef.browse()" />
                    </mx:HBox>
                </mx:FormItem>
                <mx:FormItem>
                    <mx:Button id="btnUpload" label="Upload!" click="onUpload(event)"/>
                  </mx:FormItem>
            </mx:Form>
            
        </mx:HBox>
    </mx:HBox>
    
</mx:WindowedApplication>
